sentences.en: All non - EOD explosive ordnance disposal personnel must evacuate immediately.
sentences.cn: 所有 非 排弹人员立刻撤离.

sentences.en: Army helicopters tried to evacuate the injured.
sentences.cn: 军队直升机试图转移伤员。

sentences.en: Attention: all passengers inside the term, evacuate the building immediately. Repeat.
sentences.cn: 注意: 所有乘客进入到车厢内, 立即疏散大楼. 重复.

sentences.en: Belgium sent its troops to Congo, stating that the aim was to protect and evacuate Europeans.
sentences.cn: 比利时派军队进入刚果, 声称其目的是保护及撤走欧洲人.

sentences.en: Credo : We must evacuate the residents back to Headquarters.
sentences.cn: 我们必须要疏散这些居民到总部.

sentences.en: During any incident, evacuate all non - essential personnel from the area.
sentences.cn: 在任何情况下, 须将 非 必要人员撤离.

sentences.en: If a leak occurs, immediately evacuate all personnel from the danger area.
sentences.cn: 如果发生泄露, 立刻疏散危险区域的所有人员.

sentences.en: It has forced politicians to think again about the wisdom of trying to evacuate refugees.
sentences.cn: 这迫使政治家们重新考虑疏散难民是否明智。

sentences.en: Officials ordered the residents to evacuate.

sentences.cn: 警方将该地区人员全部疏散。

sentences.en: Tell them you intend to evacuate the children.
sentences.cn: 告诉他们你打算疏散儿童.

sentences.en: They agreed on how to evacuate the civilians from the island.
sentences.cn: 他们就如何撤退岛上的居民取得了一致意见.

sentences.en: They warned residents to immediately evacuate these areas for their own safety.
sentences.cn: 传单警告了当地居民为了个人人身安全必须迅速撤离这些区域.

sentences.en: They were planning to evacuate the seventy American officials still in the country.
sentences.cn: 他们当时在计划将仍在那个国家的70位美国官员撤离。

sentences.en: Tree - like shape used to evacuate or natural happy stratified two - shaped.
sentences.cn: 树形～般采用疏散分层形或自然开心形两种.

sentences.en: We must evacuate those soldiers at once!
sentences.cn: 我们必须立即撤出这些士兵!

sentences.en: We were told by hostesses'Please evacuate, follow our guidance.
sentences.cn: 空中小姐告诉我们 ‘ 按照指示,离开飞机’.

words.tran_cn: 疏散；撤出；排泄（evacuate的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 疏散，转移，撤离，排空（胃肠）
trans.tran_en: to send people away from a dangerous place to a safe place
to send people away from a dangerous place to a safe place
